name: panda-css-vscode
description: The official Panda plugin for VS Code

panda.color-hints.semantic-tokens.enable.title: Color hints
panda.color-hints.semantic-tokens.enable.description: Enable semantic tokens multiple color hints

panda.diagnostics.invalid-token-path.title: Invalid token path
panda.diagnostics.invalid-token-path.markdownDescription:
Changes the severity of the diagnostic for invalid token paths 
(ex: `css({ border: '1px solid token(xxx) })`)

panda.hovers.instances.enabled.title: Instance hover preview
panda.hovers.instances.enabled.description: Enable instance css preview on hover

panda.hovers.tokens.enabled.title: Tokens hover preview
panda.hovers.tokens.enabled.description: Enable tokens css preview on hover

panda.hovers.tokens.conditions.enabled.title: Conditions hover preview
panda.hovers.tokens.conditions.enabled.description: Enable conditions css preview on hover

panda.hovers.semantic-colors.enabled.title: Semantic Colors hover preview
panda.hovers.semantic-colors.enabled.description: Enable semantic colors preview on hover

panda.hovers.display.mode.title: Hover preview display mode
panda.hovers.display.mode.markdownDescription: Changes the display mode of the css preview on hover

panda.hovers.display.force-hash.title: Hover preview force className hashing
panda.hovers.display.force-hash.description: Force className hashing on hover preview, overriding the panda.config `hash` option

panda.inlay-hints.enabled.title: Inlay hints
panda.inlay-hints.enabled.description: Enable inlay hints next to tokens

scripts.build: pnpm build:lsp && tsup --entry src/index.ts --entry src/server.ts --format cjs --external vscode --external esbuild --minify -d dist --clean --shims
scripts.dev: tsup --entry src/index.ts --entry src/server.ts --watch --format cjs --external vscode --external esbuild -d dist --clean --shims --watch . --watch ../language-server/dist/index.js
